thread.section_title: Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Royal treatment!
thread.title_full: Royal treatment! - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ghotai
title: Royal treatment!
text:
You are treated like royalty here! The staff is incredible, and politely and courteously cater to your every whim! My wife wanted the room a bit warmer, but the rooms are warmed through radiators. They brought up a space heater and all was well. The wine at night was nice-- the staff actually came out to our table by the fire and asked us if we wanted a refill! Location is great, mere steps from Times Square, with easy access to the subway system. What was also great was early check in-- we traveled here, arriving early, and had arranged for early check in-- it was very nice to freshen up before we ventured out into the city!
Room Tip: upper floor away from the street See more room tips
